introduction:
You can cancel your practical driving test online between 6am and midnight, Monday to Sunday.

%You won't lose your booking fee if you cancel more than 3 clear working days before the test. If it's less than 3 days, you’ll lose your fee. Sunday doesn't count as a working day.%
more_information:
To cancel your test online, you’ll need 2 of the following details:

- your valid Great Britain or Northern Ireland driving licence number

- your application reference number

- your theory test pass certificate number
overview: Cancel your practical driving test online between 6am and midnight, Monday to Sunday
title: Cancel your practical driving test
